response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to your specific needs. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its true worth lies in finding the right person who can appreciate and utilize it to its full potential. Given its significance, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $800,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant discount compared to its actual value. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am eager to share more details with you and help you make an informed decision.", "product_price": 800000}
